short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: visualize the year's progress on every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You probably know exactly where you are on Earth;
but do you know where you are in the year?

On every new tab, see 2021 as a progress bar, so you know how much has passed, and how much is left.

––––––––––––––––––––––––

The calendar is great for organizing our society and customs. But whoever came up with the confusing 12 months, 52 weeks, and 365 days was clearly not thinking about you.

Time flows in a line, not a grid, and it signifies change and progress.
Lets display it that way.

––––––––––––––––––––––––

A lot can happen from 0 to 100%, what will you accomplish?
